title: Mozilla sync account
content:
Hello, I recently created a new sync account for work so I wouldn't have to use my personal sync account. I noticed after creating the new sync account it still retained my passwords from my personal account. Is it safe for me to delete all my personal passwords on the work account or will it also delete those passwords on my personal?

Thanks
creator: lwcstudents17

title: Firefox Not Loading Pages: Error Code ERR_CONNECTION_TIMED_OUT
content:
I'm encountering a frustrating issue with Mozilla Firefox where it fails to load web pages, showing an error message with 'Error Code ERR_CONNECTION_TIMED_OUT.' This problem has persisted for several days now, affecting all websites I attempt to visit.

Despite having a stable internet connection and trying basic troubleshooting steps like clearing cache and cookies, restarting the browser, and checking for updates, the issue remains unresolved.

As Firefox is my primary browser for accessing the internet, this issue severely hampers my productivity and online activities. Any assistance in resolving this issue would be greatly appreciated.

Additional Details:

Browser: Mozilla Firefox Error Code: ERR_CONNECTION_TIMED_OUT Internet Connection: Stable and working fine for other devices and activities No recent changes made to browser settings or extensions prior to the issue's onset.

title: System bogs down when too many browser windows are open
content:
I currently am using Nightly and running Windows 10 on a dual monitor setup. I switched to it after it was suggested to me by this forum to resolve an issue that all my browser windows were opening in one monitor on reboot and restore. Nightly did indeed resolve that.

Because of the type of research I do, I may at any time have a hundred or more browser windows open with multiple tabs in each. When I was running regular Firefox, I would have to reboot every third day or so when my computer would start to bog down. The browsers would get slow to respond or stop responding.

Since switching to Nightly, I have found that I sometimes have to reboot multiple times a day with even less browser windows active.

I know Nightly is beta and has many updates required often. Should I move back to Firefox? Has Firefox resolved the issue with all windows being opened in a single monitor? Are their any settings, third party add ons, etc that can prevent my computer from bogging down (something that keeps the browser from using resources even when a particular window isn't in focus).
creator: spike333

title: Deleted passwords not syncing
content:
I have Firefox on 3 devices, I deleted several passwords from 1 device expecting this change to sync to the other 2 devices. Now that device appears to have resynced the passwords I deleted. Am I supposed to delete them on each device?

I have the latest version of FF on all devices.

title: Bookmarks and passwords missing from Mozilla Account
content:
Hi Team,

I have been using firefox for 2 years now at work, logged in to sync the passwords and bookmarks. To my knowledge it seemed to be working fine.

I reimaged my laptop last week and reinstalled firefox and logged into my account and it did not download any of my saved bookmarks and saved passwords.

I suspect it may have been caused by a partially failed initial install of Firefox which may have wiped the data from the account.

Does mozilla keep backups of the profile data? If they do, could my account be restored to the state it was in on Thursday 28 March 2024?

Thanks Socrates

title: Omni.ja has hidden matherial. I  never installed omni.ja. Seems to come from uninstalled crome
content:
Omni.ja has hidden matherial. I never installed omni.ja. Seems to come from uninstalled crome

My report was in swedish Omni.ja has hidden matherial. I never installed omni.ja. Seems to come from uninstalled crome


Synnerligen allvarligt när åklagare domare och polis ingår i organiserad brottslighet. I går dömdes en tydligen sexuellt ofredande individ i Helsingborg till ett halvårs fängelse. Jämför med att jag dömdes av tf Domaren Martin Persson Helsingborgs TR samt åklagaren Claudio Gittermann till ett års fängelse eller egentligen på obestämd tid med rättspsykiatrisk vård för att ge utrymme för ett noga av polisen Bengt Andersson Ängelholm arrangerar angrepp där en lagfartskapare Emanuelsson från Varberg anställts av kronofogden i Helsingborg för att komma över vår egendom i Mölle och avsikten med arrangemanget visat sig vara ett direkt mordförsök på mig. I upplägget deltog Syriska Hamas med en expert från invandralägret i Nyhamnsläge. Gängkriminella infiltrerar myndigheter och politiska partier enligt Gunnar Strömmer. Här har vi alltså exempel på hur gängkriminella infiltrerat polis domare och kronofogde samt inom rättspsyk. Det har visat sig att två huvudsakliga grunder kunnat identifieras nämligen dels angrepp med anledning av tidigare angrepp då bland annat generaldirektören Anita HSAN medverkat i borttagande av journalblad för en av mina patienter för att försöka skapa falsk grund för en falsk anmälan mot mig där socialdemokraterna i Regeringen och Regions styrelsen Skåne samverkade i brottet som avsåg att tysta mig för att kunna angripa mina forskarkollegor i USA för att de hade en judisk bakgrund och vårt arbete hade blivit alldeles för lyckat för en grupp sossar från Malmö som hade tänkt utnyttja min forskningsvistelse för att skapa ett radioprogram som man ville kunna använda för att förmå någon sinnessjuk att mörda den såsom utrikesminister Anna Lindh ifrågasatte vilka intressen som låg bakom Palmemordet och det gäller först just sådana Hamassossar som inte tyckte att Palme passar i den modell de tänkt sig för sossarna. Den andra anledningen till angreppet kan härledas till Bengt Andersson medverkan i stölden av vårt aktiebolag von Malmborg Innovation AB.
creator: vonmalmborgjm

title: Lost Bookmarks
content: Received an error message Platform version 124.0.2 not compatible min/max version >=124.01.... Can these be pulled from anywhere else?
